When A fast food restaurant that brings in 1 million dollars in sales a year, how much profits do they make about?
In: Business › Finance&Economy
Rate This Answer
Well, if they 'bring in' a million dollars, they probably turn half of that into profit. Unless the business is doing very poorly. ChaCha! Answered
